text:
="preserve">Theodoros Mitras (14 May 1948 – 12 January 2021) was a Greek politician and lawyer. He was born in Katerini, Greece. He was a member of the New Democracy Party. Mitras was a member of the Hellenic Parliament from 1993 to 1996.
Mitras died on 12 January 2021 in Thessaloniki, Greece at the age of 72.
